publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-213 Mr Andy Kerr: Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolutionâ€”That the Parliament for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure of the Scottish Ministers payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act.

S2M-213 Mr Andy Kerr: Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution-That the Parliament for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure of the Scottish Ministers payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act.
